CustomField.description: Total of all Drawdowns excluding Payments received from Client, Referral Fees, Payments Re-Processed, and Payments Rejected. Used on ELFI1 and Portfolio Reports.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Drawdowns with balance outstanding or accrued interest in reporting period. This condition naturally excludes those created and closed before/after reporting period and things which do not accrue interest(Payments, Referral Fees, Payments Re-Proc/Rejectd)
CustomField.label: Principal Borrowed as of To Date
